channel.title: Comments on: What does Clericalism mean in a Jewish context?
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Yonatan
item.dc:creator: Yonatan
item.description:
Is this clericism or just an old boys network? Is it the fact that he is Rabbi that protected him or because he was influencial and powerful. I would think it the latter.
Most insular communities protect "their own" whether they have smicha or not.
item.content:encoded:
Is this clericism or just an old boys network? Is it the fact that he is Rabbi that protected him or because he was influencial and powerful. I would think it the latter.

Most insular communities protect “their own” whether they have smicha or not.

item.title: By: Jonathan Hirsch
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Hirsch
item.description: This raises an important issue ,We need to understand the Religious doctrines ,Sociological and ,Historical factors that causes Clericalism to exsist in Orthodoxy .
item.content:encoded: This raises an important issue ,We need to understand the Religious doctrines ,Sociological and ,Historical factors that causes Clericalism to exsist in Orthodoxy .
